header.title: Web Developer working with JavaScript, TypeScript and PHP

about.title:
Let’s get know
about me closer
about.text: I'm a full stack developer (React.js & Laravel) with a focus on creating (and occasionally designing) exceptional digital experiences that are fast, accessible, visually appealing, and responsive. Even though,I have been creating web applications for over three years, I still love it as if it was something new.

list.title: Frontend
list.description: I design the user interfaces of your web applications while respecting standards, optimizing performance and ensuring compatibility with various browsers and devices for a smooth and exceptional user experience.

list.title: Web application
list.description: I create responsive and elegant web applications using modern and popular technologies. UX is as important as UI, so I make sure your web application is accessible.

list.title: Formations
list.description: As passionate about web development as I am about sharing knowledge, I offer special training courses in frontend development, particularly on React.js. If you're a school or organization looking for a trainer, don't hesitate to contact me for a quick, customized program.

list.name: Scanifood
list.except: A smart solution that helps restaurants create digital menus with QR codes. No more printing paper menus - just scan and order!
list.description: A smart solution that helps restaurants create digital menus with QR codes. No more printing paper menus - just scan and order!

list.name: Afimey Store
list.except: Afimey Store is an e-commerce platform that allows customers to order products online.
list.description: Afimey Store is an e-commerce platform that allows customers to order products online.

list.name: My Blog
list.except: It is my personal blog where I share my experiences, tips, tutorials, articles and also projects on web development in general. In particular, all topics related to React and its ecosystem.
list.description: It is my personal blog where I share my experiences, tips, tutorials, articles and also projects on web development in general. In particular, all topics related to React and its ecosystem.

list.name: React
list.description: React is the most popular Javascript library for building dynamic and elegant web applications. It's my favorite library for building web interfaces. I've been using React for three years now.

list.name: Next.js
list.description: Next.js is a popular open-source React framework used to build server-side rendered (SSR) and statically generated (SSG) web applications. I use it in almost all my recent projects.

list.name: Laravel
list.description: Laravel is one of the most popular PHP frameworks, and I've been using it on some of my recent projects, as well as for clients depending on their needs.

list.name: Sadio Sangharé
list.testimonial: As passionate about web development as I am about sharing knowledge, I offer special training courses in frontend development, particularly on React.js. If you're a school or organization looking for a trainer, don't hesitate to contact me for a quick, customized program.
